translation.en: -[man] It's got a red trunk. -[mechanic] What?
The trunk is red. The car is black. Lid of the trunk is red.

as in not a black fucking car with a red fucking trunk.

steering wheel, everything that was on that list. Six grand worth.

Clay, pick up the phone. Call me back, come on.

-It's a place. -Yeah? What kind of place?

Don't leave the apartment or you're grounded for life.

Kate...?

You know, "get in," "look out," "watch for the cops."
-That kind of shit. -Cop? Cop? Where is he? Where is he? [laughs]

What's in the bag?

-What is it? -Sit back.

-Nothing? -Nothing.

Three dudes sitting in a fucking car, nothing to call each other--

that's just fucking-- just fucking weird.

-That's fine. -I know that's fine.

-[Motherfucker] What about you? -My name is Ben Okri,

here we are.
It's still fucking weird, but, at least, we're all somebody, right?

-[bangs] -Pull fucking closer next time!

For the rest of the night, you don't take any calls except for this blocked number.

or they'll shoot you in the head at the drop.

Fuck.

Hello?

God...

You're addicted. You can't not do it. You know you could just work at a garage
translation.de: Du bist süchtig. Du kannst es nicht lassen. Wärst du Mechaniker, wärst du jetzt bei Katie.

translation.en: and be home with your daughter right now.
translation.de: Wärst du Mechaniker, wärst du jetzt bei Katie.

translation.en: -Jess? -But, no. No, that's not for you...
Hey, Jess, hey, Jess-- hey, Jess, could you shut the fuck up for a second?
translation.de: Könntest du mal kurz die Klappe halten?

translation.en: This is serious! I need you to fucking do me a favor!

translation.en: I need you to go get her. All right? I need you to leave the house. Can you do that?
translation.de: Hol sie ab. Verlass das Haus. Geht das?

translation.en: -Fuck you! I can't get her tonight. -Jess.
Okay? I can't get her tonight. I'll pick her up tomorrow.
translation.de: Ok? Heute geht nicht. Ich hole sie morgen ab.

translation.en: -And I left you a message. -I know.
-What do you mean "no"? -No, I said "I know." I said I know.
I got the message. Just do me a favor, and just go pick her up, please.
translation.de: Tu mir einen Gefallen, und hol sie bitte ab.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm, I'm-- hang on!
What? No hang on. Don't go anywhere. Jess, don't go anywhere.
translation.de: Was? Nein. Bleib, wo du bist.

translation.en: -Could you just hang on, please? -Don't--
Jess, I need you to leave the house.
-I gotta get the door. Hang on. -Just go now.
Fuck. Jess!
-Pick up the phone! Son of a-- -[Jess screaming]
-[man] Get her to the car! -Stop it! No!
-Jess! -[man] Shut your fucking mouth!
-Jess! Fuck! -[beeping]
[Philly] You bring me that money now, yes?
translation.de: Bringst du mir jetzt das Geld?

translation.en: I know you're not the guy.
You bring me that money or you can listen to get her fucked!
translation.de: Du tust es, oder du kannst zuhören, wie sie gefickt wird!

translation.en: I'll fuck her myself.
-I'll fuck her. -Okay.
Where are you?
-I'm at 32nd. -Where?
-Near the tracks. Let me talk to her. -Stop the car right there.
translation.de: -Neben den Gleisen. Gib sie mir. -Halt sofort an.

translation.en: Stop the car right there! I'll have someone there in two minutes.
translation.de: Halt sofort an! Jemand ist in zwei Minuten da.

translation.en: -[line beeping] -This will all be over--
-I didn't hijack your job. -[West End] You motherfucker.
Do you still have the money?
Do you?
-Yeah, I do. -There's going to be fucking blood
translation.de: -Hast du? -Ja. Es wird Blut fließen, wenn ich es nicht sofort zurückkriege.

translation.en: if that money doesn't come back to me right now.
translation.de: Es wird Blut fließen, wenn ich es nicht sofort zurückkriege.

translation.en: He's got my wife.
He's got my wife. You hear me?
-All right, I could help. -How?
You start by bringing me the money.
-You bring me that money, or I will-- -Or what?
translation.de: -Du bringst mir das Geld, sonst... -Sonst was?

translation.en: Or what? What? What are you gonna do? You're gonna kill me, huh? No shit.
translation.de: Sonst was? Was willst du tun? Mich töten? Ach was!

translation.en: No shit, you're gonna kill me. I'd fucking kill me.
translation.de: Klar willst du mich töten. Würde ich auch wollen.

translation.en: [West End] He has no use for her-- other than to leverage you. That's it.
translation.de: Den einzigen Nutzen, den er von ihr hat, ist dich zu erpressen. Das ist alles.

translation.en: You have the money. You're in control.
translation.de: Du hast das Geld. Du hast das Sagen.

translation.en: If you let him get the upper hand, he'll kill you both.
translation.de: Gewinnt er die Oberhand, tötet er euch beide.

translation.en: -You have the money. -I got a daughter!
translation.de: -Du hast das Geld. -Ich habe eine Tochter!

translation.en: You fucking hear me? I got a daughter.
He could fucking grab her, too. He snatches her. That's what scares me.
translation.de: Er könnte sie auch schnappen. Das macht mir Angst.

translation.en: What the fuck scares you? The money? Is that what it's about? The money?
translation.de: Um was hast du Angst? Ums Geld? Darum geht es? Ums Geld?

translation.en: [West End] It's not my money. It's not my money.
translation.de: Nein. Ich versprach den Auftrag jemand anderem.

translation.en: I guaranteed this job for someone else. This is bigger than $200,000.
translation.de: Nein. Ich versprach den Auftrag jemand anderem. Das geht über $200.000 hinaus.

translation.en: Clay put this job together. That shithead Clay sold it.
translation.de: Clay organisierte das. Der Mistkerl verriet uns.

translation.en: This Philly motherfucker targeted this job.
He's taking a bite out of me in front of every motherfucker in town.
translation.de: Er nimmt sich von meinem Teller vor allen in der Stadt.

translation.en: What do you think happens if you give that cocksucker the money?

translation.en: What happens to my people? To my family?
translation.de: Was passiert mit meinen Leuten? Meiner Familie?

translation.en: This situation is a weapon.
Me and mine will be eaten alive. That's what scares me.
translation.de: Ich und die Meinen werden in der Luft zerrissen. Das macht mir Angst.

translation.en: You're in over your head, and I'm the guy that could pull you out.
translation.de: Du siehst kein Land mehr, und ich kann dich retten.

translation.en: What's it gonna be?
-I still owe on the three-year stretch. -Yes.
-You owe us a three-year stretch. -Yeah.
-And I can take care of that, too. -Don't fucking "magic show" me here, man.
translation.de: -Ich kann mich auch darum kümmern. -Komm mir nicht mit Zauberei.

translation.en: Why should I trust you?
-How old is she? -Who?
Your daughter, how old?
-She's 13. -Thirteen.
You help me save my family, and I'll help you save yours.
translation.de: Rette meine Familie, und ich rette deine.

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -What do you think I'm gonna do? I'm gonna kill him.
translation.de: -Was willst du tun? -Was denkst du? Ihn töten.

translation.en: I got him on the other line. What do I do? He's got my wife. He's got my wife.
translation.de: Er ist in der anderen Leitung. Was soll ich tun? Er hat meine Frau.

translation.en: You set up an exchange. Just set it up and tell me where. That's it.
translation.de: Vereinbare einen Austausch. Dann sag mir, wo. Das ist alles.

translation.en: -Do not fuck me. -Don't fuck you?
translation.de: -Hau mich nicht übers Ohr. -Dich übers Ohr hauen?

translation.en: You got the money, pal. You got the money.
translation.de: Du hast das Geld, Kumpel. Du hast das Geld.

translation.en: You still there?
-[Philly] What the fuck--? -Let me talk to her.
-You wanna talk to her? -Let me fucking talk to her!
You wanna talk to her alive, you pull the fucking car over!
translation.de: Soll sie dabei leben, fahr endlich rechts ran!

translation.en: And tell me where the fuck you are.
translation.de: Und sag mir endlich, wo du bist.

translation.en: You wanna listen to me fuck your wife and cut her head off?
translation.de: Willst du hören, wie ich sie ficke und töte?

translation.en: -You're not gonna do shit. -You have zero bargaining chips.
translation.de: -Du machst nichts. -Du hast nichts in der Hand.

translation.en: Zero! I'll fucking kill this bitch. Do you wanna see your wife again?
translation.de: Nichts! Ich töte die Schlampe. Willst du deine Frau wiedersehen?

translation.en: Ex-wife, fuckface. And I got your money, asshole.
translation.de: Exfrau, Arschloch. Und ich habe dein Geld, Penner.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on.
[mutters] Fuck.
You're gonna calm the fuck down, huh? Say it.
translation.de: Beruhige dich mal, ja? Sag es.

translation.en: [Philly] I'm calm.
You want this money? You better stop fucking around.
translation.de: Du willst das Geld? Dann hör auf mit dem Mist.

translation.en: First, I'm gonna talk to her. Then, I'm gonna tell you where we're gonna make the exchange. Understand me?
translation.de: Gib sie mir. Dann sage ich dir, wo der Austausch stattfindet.

translation.en: You fucking lay a hand on her, I'll fucking torch the money.
translation.de: Krümmst du ihr ein Haar, fackele ich das Geld ab.

translation.en: You fuck with me, I'll torch the money.
translation.de: Tu, was ich sage, oder ich fackele es ab.

translation.en: You pull any bullshit when I pull up, I will torch the money. Put her on.
translation.de: Drehst du bei der Übergabe was, fackele ich das Geld ab. Gib sie mir.

translation.en: -[Jessica] Hello? -Jess, it's me. You okay?
-Yeah, but I don't-- -Don't talk. Don't talk.
Listen to me, I don't want you to talk. Don't say anything. Don't say a word.
translation.de: Hör zu. Sag nichts. Schweige. Kein Wort.

translation.en: He's not gonna touch you. All right? I got what he wants,
translation.de: Er tut dir nichts. Ich hab, was er will. Ich gebe es ihm.

translation.en: I'm gonna give it to him. It's gonna be fine, but I don't want you to talk, I don't want you to cry.
translation.de: Alles wird gut, aber nicht reden oder weinen.

translation.en: Don't give him a reason to even look at you. You understand me?

translation.en: You just do what he tells you to do, okay?
-Okay. -Okay, baby. Put him back on.
Don't say anything. Just put him back on.
translation.de: Sag nichts. Gib ihn mir nur wieder.

translation.en: [Philly] So?
Top of Fillmore and 19th, 15 minutes.
-Don't fucking be late. -If you don't give me--
-Fillmore and 19th. -[West End] How long?
-Fifteen minutes. Top floor. -Good. Keep him there.
translation.de: -In 15 Minuten. Oberste Etage. -Gut. Lass ihn nicht weg.

translation.en: -How you gonna do it? -You just keep him there.
translation.de: -Wie läuft es? -Du lässt ihn nicht weg.

translation.en: -He's got my wife. What are you gonna do? -Keep him there until I get there.
translation.de: -Er hat meine Frau. Sag schon. -Halt ihn auf, bis ich da bin.

translation.en: You pull this off, you bring him to me, we're square.
translation.de: Schaffst du das, lieferst du ihn mir, sind wir quitt.

translation.en: Your three years are paid. You just keep him there.
translation.de: Deine Schuld ist beglichen. Lass ihn nicht weg.

translation.en: Fuck.
-Fuck. -There you are, motherfucker!
-I couldn't get a signal. -It's okay. You all right?
-Yep. -Good girl.
-Why did you let me drive in your car? -Let's go. Good job.
-Dad-- -Give me the keys. Look at this.
Nice parking.
So, Dad, what's--
[Wheelman] All right. Okay.
[Wheelman] How was the drive?
Fine, I guess. I worked on my downshifting the whole way.
translation.de: Ich glaube, ganz gut. Ich übte Runterschalten.

translation.en: -Good girl. -[engine starts]
-Heel-toe? -No, just regular.
Dad, what's going on?
-Dad, you're bleeding. -I'm fine. It's not mine.
-Why are you bleeding? -I'm fine. It's okay.
You're not okay. We have to get you to the hospital.
Sweetie, it looks worse than it is. I'm fine. I'm not going to the hospital.
translation.de: Sieht schlimmer aus, als es ist. Wir fahren nicht ins Krankenhaus.

translation.en: Sit back. Sit back. Kate... listen to me.
translation.de: Sieht schlimmer aus, als es ist. Wir fahren nicht ins Krankenhaus. Kate... hör mir zu.

translation.en: We have to take these two bags somewhere right now, okay? Do you understand that?
translation.de: Wir müssen die zwei Taschen abliefern. Klar?

translation.en: -Dad, what's in those bags? -Just something I have to deliver.
Money. Is it money?
It's money, yeah.
You're gonna go away again.
-You're gonna go to prison again. -I'm not going away.
I'm not going anywhere, okay? We just have to deliver this money. That's it.

translation.en: I don't believe you.
Just tell them to come get it. Just tell them that you can leave it here.

translation.en: -Just tell them that they have to. -Kate! Kate!
translation.de: Sag ihnen, sie müssen. Dass du wartest!

translation.en: -Just tell them that you're waiting! -Kate! Stop it! I can't! Look at me!
translation.de: Sag ihnen, sie müssen. Dass du wartest! Hör auf! Ich kann nicht. Sieh mich an!

translation.en: I can't.
-Everything's gonna be fine, Kate. -You don't know that. I can tell.
translation.de: -Alles wird gut, Kate. -Das weißt du nicht. Ich merke das.

translation.en: -Everything will be fine. -Just shut up, Dad.
If you're just gonna keep telling me bullshit, shut the fuck up.
translation.de: Wenn du mir nur Mist erzählst, sag lieber nichts.

translation.en: What do I tell you every time this car touches the track?

translation.en: [Kate] "You're on the clock."
What are the two most important things when you're in this car?

translation.en: -Speed and timing. -Speed... and timing.
This is about both.
I want you to take this car, I want you to go to your Uncle Rich's.
translation.de: Nimm das Auto, und fahr zu Onkel Rich. Halt nicht an.

translation.en: I don't want you to stop. I don't want you to talk to anybody.
translation.de: Nimm das Auto, und fahr zu Onkel Rich. Halt nicht an. Rede mit niemandem. Sag keinem, wo du bist.

translation.en: Don't tell anybody where you are.
translation.de: Rede mit niemandem. Sag keinem, wo du bist.

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -What?
-Do you understand me? -No.
Listen, here's my wallet.
translation.de: Hör zu, hier ist mein Portemonnaie.

translation.en: I want it back. Yeah?
There's money in here and my ATM card.
-What's the pin? -[sobs] My birthday.
Your birthday. Go ahead.
You tell your Uncle Rich your mom's gonna call you, and she will.

translation.en: Tell him to keep his promise, okay?

translation.en: -[sobs] Daddy, I can't-- -Kate, Kate...
Breathe, baby. It's okay.
-[whispers] Daddy, I can't. -No, Kate.
It's okay, baby.
Want you to promise me something, okay?
You don't ever do anything
that doesn't feel right to you, in your gut, inside.

translation.en: Not for a boy, not for anyone, okay? Promise me.

translation.en: -Daddy... -Promise me.
-I promise. -You promise?
Slide over.
Okay, find your position.
Where's your position?
Good. Nine and three?
Deep breath.
You're okay.
Daddy, I'm not okay.
-I'm gonna freak out. I can't do it. -No, no. You're not gonna freak out.
You know why? 'Cause you're my daughter.
You're my daughter. You've done it a hundred times.

translation.en: What do I always tell you, baby?
-"Find the line." -Find the line.
[Wheelman] There it is. That's all it is. I wanna see her. Let her go.

[Wheelman] Let her out of the car. I wanna fucking see her.

-[Kate] No! -Let her out of the fucking car...
[Philly] Don't fuck me over. Don't fuck me! I'll fucking kill you.

-Mom? -[Jessica] Let's get out of here!
-Let's go! -Mom.
[Philly] Watch what you do. Watch what you fucking do!
translation.de: Pass auf, was du tust, verdammt noch mal.

translation.en: [Wheelman] Fuck you!
-[Wheelman] Come on, let's go, let's go! -[Philly] Go! Get him! Get him!
[Wheelman] Down the stairs!
Dad, where's Mom? Where's Mom?

translation.en: -Dad, where's Mom? -Go, go, go, go!
-Where's Mom? -Drive! She's safe. She's safe.
translation.de: -Wo ist Mom? -Fahr! Sie ist in Sicherheit.

translation.en: Good. Control.
-Where's Mom? -She's fine. She's safe.
They're after us. Just drive.
Drive.
Good. Go. Take a right. Take a right.
-Dad, what is going on? -Shift!
-See him? You see him? No? -No.
-Dad, I don't see him. -Okay, right. Right.
Stop.
-Stop? -Stop!
Go.
Dad, you are gonna have to tell me what is going on.

translation.en: Belt. We're going for a ride, Kate. Put your belt on.
translation.de: Gurt. Das wird eine wilde Fahrt, Kate. Schnall dich an.

translation.en: Come on.
-[tires screeching] -Sit back!
Phone! Pocket! Phone!
-Okay. -Answer it!
Answer it, and put it to my ear. Put it to my ear.

translation.en: -Hello? -[West End] You're not here.
-Hello? -I'm at Fillmore and 19th.
-Where the fuck are you? What? -Stay there. Stay there. He's on my tail.

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -I'm bringing him to you.

translation.en: Lower level, ground floor. You hear me?
-[Kate] Evergreen. -Evergreen.
-[Kate] The entrance is on Evergreen. -On Evergreen, lower level, ground floor.
-Stay there! -[gunfire blasts] -Down! Down! -[Kate] Dad!
What--?
-[Kate] Dad! -Get down!
Down! Down!
Down.
Get the door!
-Get him out. -All right.
Fucker.
[Philly] Fuck you!
Give me the bags. I'll be right back. I'll be right back. You stay down, okay?

translation.en: Stay down.
Good girl, good girl. Stay down, stay down.
You okay? You good?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
Where's Mom? Dad, why was she here?

translation.en: Mommy's okay, baby. We're gonna go see her right now.
translation.de: Mom geht es gut. Wir sehen sie gleich.

translation.en: -We're gonna meet her? -We're gonna meet her.
Dad, I'm sorry I didn't leave you like you said.

That was good driving, baby. You did a good job.
